item.title: WONTFIX Say Forget It at Work in a Nicer Way - White Design
item.description: Refusing a work request is not an easy thing to do. The term WONTFIX is a common way to do so in the software development business. It is arguably more polite than saying “forget it”, but the person who made the request may still be offended. /...

item.title: Please let me drop everything and work on your problem Design
item.description: You know these situations at work when your boss or co-worker has a problem that needs to be addressed immediately and everything else be dropped. Make sure to encounter them with the right statement. / The design shows the funny and sarcastic saying...

item.title: READ THE FUCKING MANUAL - Black Text Design for Computer Geeks
item.description: RTFM is an initialism for the expression “read the fucking manual” or more in the context of the Unix computer operating system, “read the fucking man page”. It is usually expressed when the speaker is irritated by another...

item.title: 408 Request Timeout - HTTP Status Code Design
item.description: A shirt for web developers who need a break. It has the HTTP status code “408” and its meaning “Request Timeout” printed in a black bold font. • Millions of unique designs by independent artists. Find your thing.

item.title: 402 Payment Required - Black Text for Web Developers
item.description: A design for professional web developers to underpin that they require payment for their work. It has the HTTP status code “402” and its meaning “Payment Required” printed in a black bold font. A good shirt to wear when applying for...
